title: Where can I buy a relatively cheap Cuntz guitar? - Quora

response.answer_text: Really? Do you think this makes you cool? LOL, obviously that’s a real deal, though in the states, it might throw some of the rails. Move to Germany, for real. the cheapest way. If you buy if from Thomann, you’ll pay painfull shipping. It’s the only thing that’s stopped me from buying a Harley Benton. They have a few really nice SG’s and semi hollow, but I sure as shit won’t pay close to $40 for a ship when I can buy a really nice guitar from Sweetwater and if it hit’s $299, I get a free 55 point inspection, which is basically a free set up, saving me $70 bucks from a luthier. Anyhow, what ever you decide, let us know, I look forward to a follow up.
